abstract: Citigroup is moving to dismantle large parts of its troubled financial empire, undoing the landmark merger that created the company a decade ago.
snippet: Citigroup is moving to dismantle large parts of its troubled financial empire, undoing the landmark merger that created the company a decade ago.
lead_paragraph: Staggered by losses despite two federal rescues, Citigroup is accelerating moves to dismantle parts of its troubled financial empire in an effort to placate regulators and its anxious investors.

headline.main: Citigroup Plans to Split Itself Up, Taking Apart the Financial Supermarket
headline.print_headline: Citigroup Plans to Split Itself Up, Taking Apart the Financial Supermarket
